title: Compensation for AFK's in ranked.
body: In recently i have noticed that there is an immense number of afks and trolls in ranked maybe it is a stroke of bad luck. I feel that from these loses there should be a system where if there is an intentional or unintentional disconnection of a player on a team. And that team is to lose the loss of LP should be reduced. Not completely just a small amount.

replies.body: Where's the "it's already in the client since before season 1" option?
Definately! I just played a game with 3 afk's... ON MY TEAM! Now i'm at 0lp wtf rito? Elo hell exists.
